items.sentence: I suspect Tom and Mary have lived in Boston.
I suspect Tom and Mary have to go to Boston.
I suspect Tom and Mary want us to help them.
Tom admitted he didn\'t like Mary very much.
What\'s the weirdest dream you\'ve ever had?
Tom is only pretending he isn\'t interested.
Do you have your driver\'s license with you?
I can\'t help wondering if Tom will do that.
Tom said it could take a few hours to do it.
Do yourself a favor and get out of here now.
Tom tried to get Mary to pay for his ticket.
Tom lay awake for hours thinking about Mary.
Tom lay awake in bed, listening to the rain.
Tom leaned across the table and kissed Mary.
Tom leaned in close so he could hear better.
Tom can be really funny when he wants to be.
Tom knew Mary was going to be in the office.
Tom should just tell Mary he made a mistake.
Tom should never have gone there by himself.
I\'m not very interested in learning French.
